title: Mask Mandates Ramp Up as Covid Cases Surge (Podcast)
itunes:title: Mask Mandates Ramp Up as Covid Cases Surge (Podcast)
description:
Dr. Bruce Farber, Chief of Infectious Diseases at Northwell Health, discusses surging virus cases and mask mandates. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Quikctake reporter Alex Webb talk about the Mad Rush to Deliver Groceries in 10 Minutes Is VC’s New Big Bet. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne on Why China Cracks Down on Its Tech Giants. Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Analyst for Fintech and Payments Julie Chariell touches on Square to Buy Afterpay for $29 Billion to Tap Younger Users. And we Drive to the Close with Shawn Cruz, Senior Markets Strategist at TD Ameritrade

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
